job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtsoftware engineer iltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtjob overviewltstronggtltpgtltpgtsoftware engineers design and develop custom software systems and integrations software engineers work with a team of fellow software engineers qa engineers and business systems analysts in an agilescrum process to deliver enhanced product value in addition to writing code the successful candidate will design technical solutions with it operations teams participate in scrum ceremonies and work with stakeholders to understand workflows and requests entrylevel engineers will primarily complete tasks assigned to them but successful engineers with engage their critical thinking skills to improve processesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtjob responsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtdesign and develop software according to ticket specificationsltligtltligtparticipate on both sides of code review giving and receiving feedbackltligtltligtparticipate in scrum ceremonies including backlog grooming sprint planning and daily standupsltligtltligtmeet with stakeholders to understand workflows and help groom ticketsltligtltligtmonitor process and log information and troubleshoot problems identifiedltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtjob requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtbachelors in computer science or related discipline is recommended but not requiredltligtltligtknowledge of objectoriented programming oop in a language like php python or javaltligtltligtexperience with frontend web development using html css and javascriptltligtltligtexperience with frontend frameworks like reactjs is a plusltligtltligtbasic understanding of relational databases such as mysql postgresql or mssqlltligtltligtability to effectively use version control including ability to branch and merge in gitltligtltligtability to programmatically read and write a variety of structured and unstructured formats such as json csv and xmlltligtltligtexperience with production and consumption of web services ex rest soap amqp is a plusltligtltligtunderstanding of docker containers and cloud technologies is recommendedltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtabout usltstronggtltpgtltpgtambry genetics corporation is a capaccredited and clialicensed molecular genetics laboratory based in aliso viejo california we are a geneticsbased healthcare company that is dedicated to open scientific exchange so we can work together to understand and treat all human disease fasterltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtat ambry everyone is welcome a career at ambry genetics is a chance to be part of a dynamic company that aims to improve health by understanding the relationships between genetics and human disease we earned our reputation as industry leaders by responsibly introducing cuttingedge genetic testing solutions and continually sharing what we learn with the global scientific communityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtat ambry you will be learning challenging yourself and having fun while collaborating with teammates through the open exchange of ideas we also offer access to gym memberships onsite food trucks lunch and learns and more our outstanding benefits program includes medical dental vision k fsa and generous paid time off pto program ambry genetics is an equal opportunity employer eoe and we maintain a drugfree work environmentltpgtltpgtambry genetics is an equal opportunity employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race and traits historically associated with race including but not limited to hair texture and protective hairstyles such as braids locks and twists color creed religion sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression including transgender status national origin ancestry age marital status or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law genetic information or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal state or local laws and ordinancesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtambry does not accept unsolicited resumes from individual recruiters third party recruiting agencies outside recruiters or firms without an executed contract in place we are not responsible for any fees related to resumes that are unsolicited or are received by ambry such resumes will be deemltemgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
